name: can-validate-legacy
description: Validation plugin for CanJS that provides an abstraction layer to your validation library of choice (Shim may be required).

scripts.version: git commit -am "Update dist for release" && git checkout -b release && git add -f dist/
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && git checkout master && git branch -D release && git push
scripts.test: npm run detect-cycle && npm run jshint && npm run testee
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm run build && npm publish --tag=pre
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish
